short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch and display LeetCode user stats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeetCode Stats Viewer

Overview:
The LeetCode Stats Viewer is a Chrome/Edge extension designed to provide a streamlined and convenient way to view LeetCode user statistics directly from your browser. With a clean and user-friendly interface, this extension allows you to quickly fetch and display key details about any LeetCode user by simply entering their username.

Features:
User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through the extension with its straightforward design, featuring input fields and buttons that are intuitive and easy to use.
Fetch User Stats: Enter a LeetCode username and click "Fetch Stats" to retrieve and display detailed statistics about the user's performance on LeetCode.
Add Friend Option: A dedicated button to manage your LeetCode connections, allowing you to add users as friends with a single click.
Dynamic Display: View the fetched statistics in a well-organized format, making it simple to track and analyze LeetCode activity.

How to Use:
Enter Username: Type the LeetCode username you want to look up in the provided input field.
Fetch Stats: Click the "Fetch Stats" button to retrieve the user's statistics.
Manage Friends: Use the "Add Friend" button to send a friend request to the entered username.

Why Use It:
This extension is perfect for LeetCode enthusiasts who want quick access to user statistics without navigating through multiple pages. Whether you're tracking your own progress or analyzing the performance of other users, the LeetCode Stats Viewer simplifies the process and enhances your LeetCode experience.

Feel free to customize this description further based on specific features or details of your extension!
